text: Rero niwigumye nk’uko bigumije za ntumwa z’Imana, zari zifise ubwihangane buniniya, kandi ntuba himirize kugahato, kuko k’umusi bazo kwibonera ivyo bemerewe bizoba nk’uko batabayeho ng’aha kw’Isi kubwabo ivyo bihano atari mumwanya w’isaha imwe gusa y’umurango, rero ubwo nibwo	butumwa	bukwiye,	kuko	hahonywa	abatari	abantu	b’inkozi	z’ibibi gusa
